asset.author: KitchenAid
asset.hookText: Chef John Varanese of Varanese Restaurant in Louisville, Kentucky uses the KitchenAid stand mixer with food processor attachment to make a salad with vine-ripened tomato, cucumber and avocado. For more information about KitchenAid stand mixer attachments, please visit: http://www.kitchenaid.com/countertop-appliances/stand-mixer-attachments/.

transcripts: The best time in the corner which uses his stand mixer with the kitchen aid food processor attachment to create a gorgeous salad vine ripened save it is cucumber and the attachment features the exact slice system which adjusts the thickness with a simple lever on nice pretty slices a cucumber and a two in one wide mouth feed tube can accommodate everything from apples to potatoes to cucumbers. Look up as is comes out of a slice a whole cucumber and under three seconds that's pretty quick. It's pretty tasty and easy with the kitchen aid stand mixer and food processor attachment. Having tools like this are very important in the kitchen.
